results.title: Features of complex medicamental therapy in patients with silent myocardial ischemia of high risk after myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: Aim: To determine the peculiarities of the course of silent @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@ (@DISEASE_Thalassemia_Beta+_Silent_Allele @DISEASE_MESH:C566065 @@@SMI@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@post-infarction cardiosclerosis@@@ depending on the risk factors (RFs); to reveal the interdependence between the presence of pathological turbulence of the heart rhythm and the peculiarities of the course of @DISEASE_Thalassemia_Beta+_Silent_Allele @DISEASE_MESH:C566065 @@@SMI@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@post-infarction cardiosclerosis@@@ and the effectiveness of treatment applying @CHEMICAL_Sulfur @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013455 @@@S@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ in complex therapy.

citations.NLM: Merhel TV, Naluzhna TV, Levandovska KV. Features of complex medicamental therapy in patients with silent myocardial ischemia of high risk after myocardial infarction. Wiad Lek. 2025;78(2):328-335. PMID: 40125748
citations.BibTeX: @article{40125748, title={Features of complex medicamental therapy in patients with silent myocardial ischemia of high risk after myocardial infarction.}, author={Merhel TV and Naluzhna TV and Levandovska KV}, journal={Wiad Lek}, volume={78}, number={2}, pages={328-335}}

results.title: Strange coincidence in the gut: pseudomelanosis duodeni diagnosed by capsule endoscopy and active bleeding due to angiodysplasia.
results.text_hl: We present the case of an 82-year-old male with a medical history of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@chronic renal failure@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Anemia_Iron_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D018798 @@@iron deficiency anemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Martín-Cardona A, Aceituno M, Arau B, Fernández-Urién I. Strange coincidence in the gut: pseudomelanosis duodeni diagnosed by capsule endoscopy and active bleeding due to angiodysplasia. Rev Esp Enferm Dig. 2022 Feb;114(2):120-121. PMID: 34470455

results.title: Usefulness of amlodipine for angina pectoris.
results.text_hl: The clinical antianginal attributes of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ were accompanied by significant reductions in electrocardiographic evidence of @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@.

results.title: An update on the safety of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Once-daily @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was shown to be a well-tolerated treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Osterloh IH. An update on the safety of amlodipine. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1991;17 Suppl 1():S65-8. PMID: 16296714
